## Form.getValue() method

Get the value of a given block, field

**Signature:**

```typescript
getValue(block: string, field: string): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block containing the field. |
|  field | string | The field for which to get the value. |

**Returns:**

any

The value of the specified field in the specified block.
